abstract: Steve Jobs broke through institutional resistance in the music business and helped change the way people get their songs.
snippet: Steve Jobs broke through institutional resistance in the music business and helped change the way people get their songs.
lead_paragraph: 11:44 p.m. | Updated Digital music is now perhaps the biggest priority in the music industry. It is the future model looked to by struggling record labels and the foundation of big-thinking start-up companies that, by at least one count, have raised more than $400 million in investment so far this year.

headline.main: He Pushed a Reluctant Industry Toward Digital Music
